_meanings:
{@--4@} To comprehend,
apprehend, understand, feel, 
experience; as in {#duHKajYa, suKajYa#} &c.

{@--8@} To act, 
engage in (with <ab>gen.</ab> of the 
instrument); {#sarpizo jAnIte#} <ls>Sk.</ls> ‘he 
engages in sacrifice with clarified butter
({#sarpi zaH#} = {#sarpizA#}).

{@--10@} To 
recognise as one's own, take 
possession of.

{@--1@} To announce, inform, make
acquainted with, make known, 
notify.
